events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit well. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified as a refund request following the customer's explanation about size problems and return.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the jacket that does not fit.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want a refund for your recent jacket purchase. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has any damage or if it is just the size issue?
Sure, my order number is 457892. The jacket is in perfect condition; it simply doesn't fit me correctly.
We can process a full refund for you. Please send the jacket back using our prepaid return label, and once we receive it, the refund will be issued.
Thank you! I appreciate the quick response and will send the jacket back today using the return label you provide.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear back on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund payment and everything is satisfactory now with your case.
Since you've confirmed the refund is received and are satisfied, we are closing this case. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a survey to gather feedback on your support experience. Your input helps us improve.
